name: pp-max
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases a selected move's max PP to 1.6× its original max PP.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises a move's max PP by 60%.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Raises the PP of a
move to its maximum
points.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Raises the PP of a
move to its maximum
points.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Raises the PP of a selected move
to its maximum level for one
POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
It maximally raises the top PP of a
selected move that has been learned
by the target Pokémon.
